text.__SUMMARY__: Guzmania blassii is a plant species in the genus Guzmania. This species is native to Costa Rica.
text.References:
An Annotated Checklist of the Bromeliaceae of Costa Rica retrieved 3 November 2009
BSI Cultivar Registry Retrieved 11 October 2009
BSI Journal V33(2), Guzmania blassii, An Attractive New Species from Costa Rica Retrieved 3 October 2011
